abstract: An explosion and fire at a Foxconn Technology plant in China that makes Apple and Dell products killed two people and injured 16.
snippet: An explosion and fire at a Foxconn Technology plant in China that makes Apple and Dell products killed two people and injured 16.
lead_paragraph: An explosion and fire at a plant that makes Apple and Dell products in China killed two people and injured 16 and brought production to a halt, a spokesman for the plant said.

headline.main: Fatal Blast and Fire Halt Work at Chinese Plant That Makes iPads
headline.print_headline: Fatal Blast and Fire Halt Work at Chinese Plant That Makes iPads

abstract: Apple has entered the final stages of negotiations with major record labels and music publishers for a service that will allow people to listen to their music stored on the Web.
snippet: Apple has entered the final stages of negotiations with major record labels and music publishers for a service that will allow people to listen to their music stored on the Web.
lead_paragraph: For tens of millions of iTunes users, listening to music may soon get a lot easier.

headline.main: Apple Is Called Poised to Offer ‘Cloud’ Music
headline.print_headline: Apple Is Called Poised to Offer ‘Cloud’ Music

byline.original: By Ben Sisario and Miguel Helft
